amendment.description: Amendment limits assistance to Tamil Nadu, India.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 108-206 to prohibit foreign assistance to support energy-related projects in the State of Tamil Nadu, India.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Menendez amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Menendez.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Menendez amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
